title: Redenzione Item

replies.body:
{{item:3504}} {{item:3222}} {{item:3107}}  LA RUNA REVITALIZE sono 3 volte piu potenti sulla cura della redenzione
 Allies within the area are healed for 30 - 370 (based on target's level), which is increased by 3 × your Heal power Heal Power,

> [{quoted}](name=onionsan01,realm=EUW,application-id=98NGV4Al,discussion-id=4yLnjp5u,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-15T11:48:36.254+0000)
>
> {{item:3504}} {{item:3222}} {{item:3107}}  LA RUNA REVITALIZE sono 3 volte piu potenti sulla cura della redenzione
>  Allies within the area are healed for 30 - 370 (based on target's level), which is increased by 3 × your Heal power Heal Power,

ma sarebbe solo l' attiva dell item redenzione?solo quello?
